typespec.trace.server.description: Define whether/how the TypeSpec language server should send traces to client. For the traces to show properly in vscode Output, make sure 'Log Level' is also set to 'Trace' so that they won't be filtered at client side, which can be set through 'Developer: Set Log Level...' command.

url.description: URL to fetch the template from.

typespec.tsp-server.path.description:
Path to 'tsp-server' command that runs the TypeSpec language server. If not specified, then 'tsp-server' will be resolved in following sequence:

1. from workspace node_modules folder
Example: ${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/@typespec/compiler

2. from PATH environment variable
Example: /usr/local/bin/tsp-server
